1559830.name: The Alchemist's Shadow - Halcyon Pike Demo
1559830.description: When he goes for help from the local police Uri finds himself locked in the asylum. Even after breaking lose from his cell he is unable to leave the building because an infestation of mutated insects block the exits. He must grab a weapon and fight thru the undead and infestation inside the hospital in order to make it back to the lighthouse to restock on supplies and craft life saving components.
1559830.supported_languages:
英语*
*具有完全音频支持的语言
